subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Big Brown’s co-owner rejected the notion that steroid withdrawal played a role in the colt’s last-place finish in the Belmont Stakes, saying a dislodged shoe on his right hind hoof was a factor.
snippet: Big Brown’s co-owner rejected the notion that steroid withdrawal played a role in the colt’s last-place finish in the Belmont Stakes, saying a dislodged shoe on his right hind hoof was a factor.
